summary: A few new items to slash your way through skyrim with.
descriptionHtml:
V3 Update log

Added a kama to the mix to which you again need advanced armors to craft.
Also I fixed a screwup on the scimitar, where it used the normal map from the kukri instead of its own.
Besides that I also changed the screw on the machete to a rivet for which I will upload some new pictures later.

V2 Update log

Added three new weapons:
Silver scimitar
Steel Kukri
Steel machete

Changed the requirement for crafting the weapons as follows:
Silver katar and scimitar, aswell as the steel kukri now requires advanced armors to craft.
The steel machete requires steel smithing and stem mortis remains at arcane crafting.

Changed some stats on the weapons to balance them out a bit.

Also added the weapons (except stem mortis) to some leveled lists, so that they should appear on
various random encounters between level 16-19

and more weapons will be added in the future, aswell as material variations on those that are already there.
---------
This is a couple of weapons i have had lying around for quite some time now that just needed finishing up before I could add them to another mod I have had lying around for ages that will take a lot more work to finish up. So I decided to just release some of the weapons as a separate mod which is what we have here. At the moment all you get is a silver katar and a rather gory sword called Stem Mortis, both of hes can be crafted at the smithy as any other weapon, but requires the arcane blacksmith perk.

Other than this I will just mention that i plan to add a few more weapons to the pack within the week if nothing else gets in the way.

So for now all there is left to say is that I hope you all enjoy this.


PS: I could and should probably have done a little more stuff on the textures, but I just wanted them up now, since they have been lying and laughing up in my face for too long now.
author: Quacko
